data.name: Your Chronicle - Artwork Addition
data.detailed_description:
This is a DLC that adds an illustration when clearing the story of Your Chronicle.

Currently added illustrations
- ED1
- ED2
- ED3
- ED4
- ED5

* You need to install the product version of Your Chronicle separately.
data.about_the_game:
This is a DLC that adds an illustration when clearing the story of Your Chronicle.

Currently added illustrations

data.short_description: This is a DLC that adds an illustration when clearing the story of Your Chronicle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz dual core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.8 GHz dual core Intel Core i5
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: 1.1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
